text: "I Wanna be Down" is a 1994 major hit song by Brandy Norwood. The single is about her flirting with a boy, whom she tries to show that she is sexy. The song was released in September 1994. The song hit #6 on Billboard Hot 100. It also hit #1 on Billboard Hot R&B; Singles Chart for four weeks. Category:1994 songs Category:Brandy Norwood songs
title: I Wanna Be Down
